verbs.description: memorial for mom [V: killed] [ARGM-LOC: in car crash] as child recovers a couple of hours before she died ashema rattigan cooked a dinner of curried chicken that her sister cheryl gregory remembers as the best meal she ever had she loved to cook and she cooked often ashema rattigan miramar florida scion cheryl gregory stacy ann melisa telemaque edmond rattigan
